website_summaries.verdict: This Luvabeau doll is the male counterpart to the Luvabella doll series, giving another gender choice for even more play.
pros: Offers kids another choice in addition to the original doll
Interacts well with other Luvabella dolls
Very realistic movements, including feeding and "peek-a-boo
cons: Clothing can be challenging to find

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful toy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this doll! It's super cute and does just what the product description says it will do. Adorable baby boy doll, so much fun to play with. It took a bit of work freeing it from the box, but worth it. Oh, and be advised that this doll is meant to be an indoor-only toy according to the paperwork that came with it. Contact with liquids, dirt, grass or concrete could damage the electronic workings inside this doll. Here he is in the Joovy blue doll car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Heather Akins

customer_reviews.title: He loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My son got a girl one for Xmas so wanted a boy one too, got this one for cheaper than the girl one at Walmart and he freaked out when he opened it. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Clements

customer_reviews.title: He makes a very loud noise when turning his head like it gets stuck or something.
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my toddler granddaughter. He makes a loud noise when he turns his head like his head wants to get stuck and it scared my granddaughter. I had to tell her he had an owie but it would get better when he exercised his head some more. I'm going to keep him and see if he gets better with time as far as the noise when turning his head goes. He is a cutie though.
customer_reviews.author: San J Rangel

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!  Our granddaughter’s favorite Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 5 year old granddaughter for her Christmas gift, along with some baby boy clothes. She absolutely loves it! I wish I had a photo of her face when we turned him on. He blinks, babbles, says Mama, moves his arms up and down, sucks on a pacifier/bottle, plays peek-a-boo and falls asleep when you lay him down. She told us today, that it was her favorite gift.
customer_reviews.author: YouSnooze-YouLose

customer_reviews.title: He is very interactive and I love that. I don't love that hair sticks to ...
customer_reviews.text: He is very interactive and I love that. I don't love that hair sticks to him. His face is covered with hair. He glitches. He is kisses is lamb and instead of saying the animal sound, he says mamma. He says mamma more then I think he should. My wife loves him but I wouldn't buy another. To expensive.
customer_reviews.author: kevin miller

customer_reviews.title: Malfunctioning
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been wanting this toy for a long time. Was purchased in September as he seems to be harder to find and we opened him yesterday (Dec 1st) for her birthday and I am very disappointed to say that he is not doing what he is supposed to be. His mouth doesn’t move like I am watching in videos and he seems to be malfunctioning. Also noticed this seller sent it to us with batteries in it when the box says batteries not included so I am assuming they already knew it wasn’t working properly.
customer_reviews.author: patricia koukol

customer_reviews.title: Luvabella boy doll
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loved this doll my granddaughter couldn't put it down.BEST toy ever. A friend bought one for his niece and I was so impressed I bought 2 a boy and girl both are great.
customer_reviews.author: Carol chapman

customer_reviews.title: Batteries aren't included ppl make sure you buy 3 c batteries
customer_reviews.text: I really with this doll would of came with batteries youd think for all the money it cost it would at least come with one set of batteries for it
customer_reviews.author: Autumn McCurdy

customer_reviews.title: I love the doll since I collect and enjoy the interaction
customer_reviews.text: Bought this doll on Jan 27th and I'm an adult. Three days ago it started making a noise when he moves his head and when I go to return it, it said that I had until March 1st. I love the doll since I collect and enjoy the interaction.
customer_reviews.author: Soraida

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: The price of this being well over $200 is ridiculous! My grandaughter loves it and couldnt get it any where else
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is gonna love this boy doll has been asking for one
customer_reviews.author: Mary Dombrowski

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Decent item. Doesn’t actually function as listed. Way over priced for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Grandaughters Christmas wish
customer_reviews.text: Really cute doll, cuter than the girl dolls. I purchased this as a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Concerned shopper

customer_reviews.title: I actually think I liked it more than my granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: Omg besides the mechanical noise that it makes, it’s very interactive and the future of dolls. I actually think I liked it more than my granddaughter
customer_reviews.author: MCHoney

customer_reviews.title: Very fun and interactive baby doll
customer_reviews.text: So excited for my little girl at Christmas she has been wanting one so finally got it!
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: four stars
customer_reviews.text: im only giving four stars because i literally just received it ... my daughter loves it and wont put him down.... will come back and give more of a real review. once we see how things are working
customer_reviews.author: Shanice lewis

customer_reviews.title: Doll love
customer_reviews.text: All 3 of my grandchildren got one for Christmas from us this year. They absolutely loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Trinityc75

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate in description.
customer_reviews.text: Stated it was a new doll and it is clear it is not. The box had tape all over it to hold it together and a scratch on the dolls head. There is also stickers all over the box that look like return labels.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Sharkey

customer_reviews.title: She loves it !
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted this for Christmas, she loves it !
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: My daughter fell in love with right from the beginning
customer_reviews.text: My daughter fell in love with right from the beginning, though she complains of the weight to carry it around. Sometimes the neck movements become jerky and sticky.
customer_reviews.author: M. F. Makala

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: 2 year old daughter loves her new baby. 4 stars because I think the price Is a little steep.
customer_reviews.author: Messly

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves him!
customer_reviews.text: He creeps me out but my daughter, who is 7, loves him!
customer_reviews.author: Kcollins0608

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: It is the most awesome interactive doll ever made but however after purchasing 3 had to send them back. They are not able to ladt over several weeks. Huge disappontment fof my grands.
customer_reviews.author: Mae

customer_reviews.title: So Realistic
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my granddaughter and she is having a great time with this doll
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to make him learn new hinge
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece and she loves it
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: He is a little creepy, but I thought so ...
customer_reviews.text: He is a little creepy, but I thought so when I bought him. Head is soft and show scratches, but caught is happy
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Welch

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous to children
customer_reviews.text: I disliked this item because the batteries over heat and exploded inside the doll
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great doll but SUPER loud robotic noises
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately we found it hard to enjoy this interactive doll with the loud ‘robotic’ sounds. It overpowers the baby cuteness :(
customer_reviews.author: Emilie T

customer_reviews.title: Fun.Happy.
customer_reviews.text: Asks questions then uses your vocabulary to continue the conversation. Laughs a lot.
customer_reviews.author: M. Charette Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for granddaughter and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Gail L Short

customer_reviews.title: I bought luvabeau in good faith.
customer_reviews.text: I bought luvabeau in good faith...for my Granddaughter for Christmas....in fact I also bought luvabella as well for my other Granddaughter.... About the second time my Granddaughter played with Luvabeau, his neck started making a squeaking noise....I paid an extra amount for Luvabeau because he was hard to find during the Christmas rush......Would not do it again....bg
customer_reviews.author: Betty Glosson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Loved it got it for my 8 year old niece and she still plays with it does everything it says it does
customer_reviews.author: Candy

product_meta.title: Luvabeau Boy interactive doll
product_meta.description: This Luvabeau Boy interactive doll is the little boy version of the Luvabella doll. Discover so many real baby surprises with Luvabeau! This adorable interactive doll will amaze you with his true-to-life facial expressions and movements! Play and interact with her in so many ways!
feature_bullets: Brand New in box. The product ships with all relevant accessories

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars151 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
